title: Haunted House - Sound Effects
description: Themed pack with horror effects for a haunted house!
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


Update One:

Male Voices (86 Sounds)


Update Two: 16/11/2023

Monster Low (5 Sounds)


This package was created thinking about a scenario where the player needs to go through a haunted house, so you will find, knocking on doors, creaking doors, footsteps, body dragging, objects dragging, and several other sounds.


Of course, I made these sounds thinking about a haunted house, but for example, the sound of footsteps on leaves can be used in many other scenarios, so as long as it works for you, you can use it without fear!


This pack was based on games with this style (which I had a good fear playing hehe) so I did a survey of the sounds that happened in that scenario to create this pack.


I'm sure your player will be much more immersed in the game with good sound effects, investing in this package you take all that and even encourages me to create more sound effects for the community at a nice price! :D


Check the preview

Check the documentation


List of Folders: Each folder has more than one file inside


  • Chains
  • Door Knock
  • Door Squeak
  • Drop Wood
  • FootStep Leafs
  • FootStep Wood
  • Gate
  • Ghost
  • Ghostly Male Voice
  • Glass and Cups
  • Hand Door
  • Heart Beat
  • Human Breath
  • Knife
  • Laughter
  • Male Voice
  • Medical Monitor
  • Monster Attack
  • Monster Growl
  • Monster Wake
  • Push or Drag Heavy Object
  • Push or Drag Wood Object
  • Scare Pitch
  • Scary Strings
  • Scary Violins
  • Scratching
  • Sharping Knife
  • SoundScape
  • Static
  • Wind Toy
  • Windows
  • Zipper


This bundle is now part of this Bundle:

Horror Bundle - Sound Effects in Sound Effects - UE Marketplace (unrealengine.com)


Don't worry! This package will still receive updates :)
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 219

Number of Audio Cues: 219

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) looping sounds have "loop" in the name

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Important/Additional Notes: The recorder used for the sounds is the H4N pro, and the image is distributed free of charge for commercial use by pixabay, with the photo by tama66
